### Predição

```{r, echo=FALSE}

ggplot(test_data, aes(x=price_pred, y= MSRP)) + 
  geom_point(colour = "blue", alpha = 0.5, 
             position = position_jitter(width=0.2)) +
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x="Predito", y="Observado", title = "Observado vs Predito")

```
